post.content:
Job Opportunities 

1. Blooing is recruiting content writers with a passion for journalism to work with them remotely.

Description

Job type: Full-time 

Salary: UK minimum wage (£11.44 per hour)

Basic education (BSc, HND, OND)

Have adequate time to properly write cohesive reviews

No experience is required 

If you’re passionate about writing, apply now on the website to work with Blooing.

Click Here to Apply

Application Deadline: May 24, 2024.

2. Beacongate Limited Recruitment for Intern

Description

Job Location: Lagos (Remote)

Employment Type: NYSC

Requirements

  • Graduate / Corper with at least 2:1.
  • Candidates should be Corps members or fresh graduates with a background in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Mechanical or Electrical.
  • Must not be more than 26 years.

Send your CV to: bgatecareers@gmail.com using “Intern Pro-Invoice” as the subject of the mail.

3. Mobile Application Developer at CredPal

Description

Location: Lagos

Job Type: Contract / Hybrid

Level: Entry – Junior

  • Proven experience as a Mobile Application Developer with a proven track record of successful projects.
  • In-depth knowledge of mobile app architecture, design principles, and industry best practices.
  • Proficient in utilizing Flutter for mobile application development.
  • Strong grasp of UI/UX design principles and adherence to user interface guidelines.

Apply Here

4. Digital Marketing Specialist at Buybeta Investment Limited

Description

Salary: N250,000 Monthly.

Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

Employment Type: Full-time

  • Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 2+ years relevant work experience.
  • Develop and execute a comprehensive digital marketing strategy aligned with Company’s brand goals and target audience.
  • Manage and maintain Company’s website, ensuring it is user-friendly, informative, and optimized for search engines (SEO).

Resume to: ugomma.buybetter@gmail.com using the Job Title as the subject of the mail.

5. Content Creator at Buybeta Investment Limited

Description

Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

Employment Type: Full-time

  • Minimum 1 year of experience creating engaging content for social media platforms.
  • Strong understanding of current beauty trends and the social media landscape.
  • Excellent video editing skills (familiarity with editing software like Final Cut Pro, Capcutor Adobe Premiere Pro is a plus).
  • Experience with product photography and basic photo editing skills is preferred.

Resume, Cover Letter, and a link to their online Portfolio showcasing their content creation skills to: ugomma.buybetter@gmail.com using the Job Title as the subject of the mail.

6. Undergraduate Graphics Design Intern at Sophia ERP Limited

Description

Ikeja, Lagos 

  • Ability to create visually appealing designs for web, print and social media.
  • Knowledge of design software (Photoshop, Corel Draw, Canva, etc).
  • Currently enrolled in an undergraduate program and in any related discipline
  • Candidates must reside in Lagos Mainland; proximity to Ikeja is an advantage.
  • This is a hands-on role where you will have the chance to contribute to various projects and initiatives, gaining exposure to different aspects of graphic design.

Apply Here

7. Brand and Marketing Manager at JustHR

Description

Location: Victoria Island, Lagos

Employment Type: Full-time

  • Analyze brand positioning and consumer insights
  • Shape and communicate our vision and mission
  • Translate brand elements into plans and go-to-market strategies
  • Manage a team of marketing people working on brand initiatives
  • Lead creative development to motivate the target audience to “take action”

CV to: vincintoire@gmail.com using the Job Title as the subject of the email.

8. Junior WordPress Developer at Social Growth Africa

Description

Location: Any city, Nigeria (REMOTE)

Employment Type: Full-time

  • Meeting with clients to discuss website design and function.
  • Designing and building the website front-end.
  • Creating the website architecture.
  • Designing and managing the website back-end including database and server integration.

Resume to: Socialgrowthafrica@gmail.com using the job title as the subject of the mail.

9. LifeWORTH HMO is looking to hire a Network Engineer. 

Description

DEADLINE: 5th / April -/2024

Salary Range: N130,000 – N180,000 per month

Location: Lagos

Employment Type: Full-time

In this role, you will be responsible for providing technical support and assistance to end-users, as well as managing and maintaining our network infrastructure to ensure optimal performance, reliability, and security.

  • Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistance to end-users for hardware, software, and network-related issues.
  • Install, configure, and maintain desktops, laptops, printers, and other IT equipment.
  •  Administer and maintain network infrastructure, including switches, routers, firewalls, and wireless access points.
  • Document and maintain IT systems, configurations, procedures, and policies.
  • Provide training and guidance to end-users on IT best practices, security awareness, and usage of IT systems and applications.

Requirements:

Must have completed their NYSC program.

  • 1-3 years of experience in IT support and/or network engineering roles.

Interested candidates should send their resumes to hr@lifeworthhmo.com using “Network Engineer Application” as the subject of the mail.

10. Social Media Manager At BBE Marketing Inc 

Description

REMOTE, Worldwide 

Pay: $100/Month

  • Proven track record of creating viral content and growing social media audiences.
  • Expertise in video creation, including but not limited to scripting, shooting, and editing.
  • Strong understanding of social media analytics and the ability to adjust strategies based on data-driven insights.
  • Ability to stay updated with industry trends and the changing dynamics of social media platforms.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
  • A creative mind with a passion for storytelling.

Apply Here
